reviewText: Now you all know how funny and laughable Martin and the cast are. I love this DVD so much. I had to buy it to have whenever I can't find the reruns on TV. Hilarious! I be crying laughing with gut deep fun laughter.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: What can i say, who does not like The Martin Lawrence Show, these are some great DVD's, and they come in good hand whenever the cable goes out.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: Martin DVD's are still funny today as it was many years ago.  I would watch-out for certain episodes because of the sexual gesture and curse words used.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: Martin is a great comedian.  Funny scene after funny scene with some kind of crisis involved constantly.He is backed by a good group of characters.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: I rate Martin close to Sanford and Son. No matter how many times you see it, it's still funny. I collect DVD for my rocking chair days. This is a series I can see myself watching in my latter years of life.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: Great DVD to have. Comedy is the best. Quality never gets old. Episodes are classics. Must have if a Martin fan.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: you had to have seen the show before so you know its funny but its good to take a trip down memory lane. i have seasons 1-4 and i would have gotten season 5 but he was waay to high during that season and his reactions were real slow to all the punch lines but back on topic season 1 gives you a commentary from martin and bloopers from the first season and kinda wish he would have done it for all of the seasons
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: Season 2 Episode 17 is the funniest thing ever. With the stuffed dog??? Awwww, man, I cry like it's my first time, every time!
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: You got to love the show and the diff seasons it just one of those times less show that will be funny year and year later. Good price i bought all four of the first season and have been warned the fifth is not as great as the rest but im sure i will end up completeing my collection. But im sure anybody who loves this already is well aware of the show. It took a while with my items buddled to get to me but all in all im pleased with the end result brand new in mint condion.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: This was such a great buy. Two gems in one. I could spend the rest of my life watching re-runs of Martin. Martin Lawrence is genius!
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: I purchased seasons 1-2 & 3-4 as sets for around $40 total. I would suggest that you buy them in sets instead of singles. You'll come out a lot cheaper. I have to purchase season 5 & I will as soon as I can find it for under $24 dollars. Its worth the investment & looks good on blu-ray.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: I had forgotten how funny Martin Lawrence use to be.  These DVDs brought back the memories, and my entire family enjoy watching them.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: The cast was perfect. The different characters that Martin portrayed was brilliant. The series will be another great in a long line of like African American sitcoms such as The Jeffersons, Good TImes, That's My Mama, The Cosby Show as well as others.
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons

reviewText: talk about hilarious memories!!  even in the 1st episode of season 1 where pam and shanene go @ it...i was laughing so hard, my face hurt!!  i had to actually stop the dvd to catch my breath because i was crying laughing!! this package is great cuz you get the first two seasons for the price of one.  there's even the episode where martin challeges a professional boxer to a match for flirting with gina!!  i just can't get over how good the show still is even after 20 yrs!!  if you loved watching the show, you're gonna love it even more getting the dvd collection!!  i'm a huge fan of martin lawrence and this show is by far my all-time fave show!! i love how real the characters are!!  you're not gonna be disappointed!!
summary: the show is still tha bomb!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Title: Martin - The Complete First Two Seasons
